s.text: The NYT lead reports that the White House said Thursday it would not submit the proposed global warming treaty for Senate ratification until developing countries agree to participate in its restrictions, something these countries refused to do at Kyoto until they see developed countries like the U.S. cut their own emissions first.
In politics, what could be worse than having your cold, dead ass dug up from Arlington Cemetery when it's discovered that your tombstone there is full of lies?
Yeah, but Bill Moyers never did a show where he had some of his butt cells transplanted into his face.

The judge also made another ruling that gets less attention: he refused to order Microsoft to stop asking business partners to sign "non-disclosure" provisions that require notifying Microsoft when passing information along to the government.
